    Methods

    | Edit this page View Source

    CalculateAcceleration(double, double, int)

    Calculates a t-s diagram for the vehicles Acceleration. This is done by splitting the accelerating into pieces with the length of interval.

    Declaration
    public List<double> CalculateAcceleration(double startSpeed, double endSpeed, int interval)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    double startSpeed

    the start speed of the Acceleration phase
    double endSpeed

    the end speed of the Acceleration phase
    int interval

    the interval in which the calculation should be done in meters
    Returns
    Type Description
    List<double>

    a list containing the speed values of the vehicle at given distances, where the element of the list with index n is the Velocity of the vehicle after n * interval meters in length
    Exceptions
    Type Condition
    ArgumentException

    if an invalid argument (negative speeds, endSpeed less than or equal to start speed or non-positive interval) is passed
    | Edit this page View Source

    CalculateBraking(double, double, int)

    Calculates a t-s diagram for the vehicles breaking. This is done by splitting the breaking into pieces with the length of interval.

    Declaration
    public List<double> CalculateBraking(double startSpeed, double endSpeed, int interval)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    double startSpeed

    the start speed of the breaking phase in m/s
    double endSpeed

    the end speed of the breaking phase in m/s
    int interval

    the interval in which the calculation should be done in meters
    Returns
    Type Description
    List<double>

    a list containing the speed values of the vehicle at given distances, where the element of the list with index n is the Velocity of the vehicle after n * interval meters in length
    Exceptions
    Type Condition
    ArgumentException

    if an invalid argument (negative speeds, endSpeed greater than or equal to start speed or non-positive interval) is passed
    | Edit this page View Source
